description.short: Conversational AWS operations assistant for incident response
description.full: OpsAgent Controller helps platform teams diagnose AWS incidents and perform controlled remediation actions through chat interfaces with approval gates and comprehensive audit logging. Features include CloudWatch metrics analysis, EC2 instance management, and secure approval workflows.

commands.title: health
commands.description: Check OpsAgent system health and status

commands.title: describe instance i-1234567890abcdef0
commands.description: Get detailed information about an EC2 instance

commands.title: cpu metrics for i-1234567890abcdef0
commands.description: Get CPU utilization metrics for an EC2 instance

commands.title: cloudwatch metrics AWS/EC2 CPUUtilization
commands.description: Get CloudWatch metrics for a specific namespace and metric

commands.title: reboot instance i-1234567890abcdef0
commands.description: Request to reboot an EC2 instance (requires approval)
